text: Va ʙa [sūji qavmi] Samud ʙarodaraşon Soleh ro [firistodem] Ū guft: «Ej qavmi man, Alloh taoloro ʙiparasted, ki çuz Ū ma'ʙud [-i ʙarhaq] nadored. Be tardid, daleli ravşane az [sūji] Parvardigoraton ʙaroi şumo omadaast. In modaşuturi Alloh taolo [ki az dili saxraho ʙerun omadaast] ʙarojaton mu'çizaest, pas, ūro [ʙa holi xud] voguzored, to dar zamini Alloh taolo [ʙicarad va alaf] ʙixūrad va ʙa ū ozor [-u oseʙe] narasoned, ki şumoro azoʙi dardnoke faro xohad girift
